summary: An over zealous pokemon called Keldeo enrages a very powerful Kyurem, with the help of Ash and Pikachu can Keldeo become a sword of justice and defeat the mighty Kyurem?
cast: Sarah Natochenny|Eileen Stevens|Jason Griffith|Vic Mignogna|Marc Thompson|Tyler Bunch|Ikue Ôtani|Emlyn Elisabeth Morinelli|Alyson Leigh Rosenfeld|Erica Schroeder|Finn Wayland|Henry Wayland|Tom Wayland|Eli James|David Manis|Emily Bauer|Michele Knotz|Lisa Ortiz|Rodger Parsons|Bill Rogers|Kayzie Rogers|Vicki Benckert|Anders Byström|Jason Flores Contreras|Dick Eriksson|Adam Fietz|Rica Matsumoto|Mamoru Miyano|Elina Raeder|Rola|Maria Rydberg|Norea Sjöquist|Hans Wahlgren|Aoi Yûki
title: La Película Pokémon: Kyurem vs. el espadachín místico
